page.title: 17ORGANISATIONS
page.content: LOCAL GROUPS THAT RUN IN THE VILLAGE OF WILLAND MANY AT THE VILLAGE HALL. BRITISH LEGION, OVER 60'S, GARDEN PRODUCE, SQUARE DANCE, BROWNIES, YOUTH CLUB(OWN CENTRE BY VILLAGE HALL), SUNDAY SCHOOL, OLD TIME DANCE AND THE SPORTS CLUBS. {MEALS ON WHEELS}OPERATES ON TUESDAY AND FRIDAY LUNCH TIMES. {THE PLAY SCHOOL}FORMED IN 1965 MEETS IN THE VILLAGE HALL ON FOUR MORNINGS IN THE WEEK AT 9.30am TO 11.45am.IT COSTS 50p A MORNING. AT THIS TIME JULY 1985 THEY HAVE 38 CHILDREN ON ROLL. THEY HAVE TO FUND RAISE TO PAY FOR THE RENT AND EQUIPMENT. THEY LINK CLOSELY WITH THE PRIMARY SCHOOL. THEY HAVE MANY OUTINGS E.G. ZOO, FARMS, PICNICS. VISITORS TO THE GROUP ARE HEALTH VISITOR, NURSES,POLICEMEN, DENTIST , SOCIAL WORKER. DURING THE MORNING THE CHILDREN HAVE MILK, APPLE OR BISCUITS
